comment: Indexed intersection with a universal index class. When ` A ` doesn't depend on ` x ` , this evaluates to ` A ` by ~ 19.3 and ~ abid2 . When ` A = x ` , this evaluates to ` (/) ` by ~ intiin and ~ intv . (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2008.)
